errors.supabaseConfigMissing: Supabase configuration missing. Please check environment variables.
errors.failedToLoadOpponentNames: Unable to load previous opponent names.
errors.matchCreationFailed: Failed to create match: Missing match identifier from database response.
errors.playerStatsUpdateFailed: Failed to update player match stats
errors.matchUpdateFailed: Match update failed: Match not in running state or not found
errors.matchNotFinished: Match must be finished before updates can be applied.
errors.fairPlayAwardFailed: Unable to assign fair play award for this match.
errors.fairPlayNoStats: No player statistics were updated with the fair play award. Ensure the player participated in this match.
errors.matchNotFoundOrDeleted: Match not found or already deleted
errors.invalidPlayerStats: Player stats must be an array
errors.noValidPlayerStats: No valid player stats to update
errors.loanPlayerRequired: At least one player is required
errors.loanTeamNameTooLong: Receiving team name must be 200 characters or less
errors.noTeamSelected: No current team selected. Please create or select a team first.
errors.matchSavedSuccess: Match saved to your history successfully!
